meanings.definition: A very large expanse of sea, in particular each of the main areas into which the sea is divided geographically.
meanings.sent1: The oceans are vast bodies of water.
meanings.sent2: I love swimming in the oceans during summer.
meanings.sent3: The oceans whispered secrets to the curious sailor.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as deep and mysterious as the oceans.
meanings.sent5: The oceans roared with power and beauty.

meanings.definition: The vast body of salt water that covers almost three fourths of the earth's surface.
meanings.sent1: We must protect the oceans from pollution.
meanings.sent2: The oceans teem with diverse marine life.
meanings.sent3: The oceans play hide and seek with the sun's rays.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as boundless as the oceans.
meanings.sent5: The oceans hold the secrets of ancient civilizations.
